welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bensonville, Liberia! Known for its vibrant culture and friendly locals, this charming city has so much to offer. We invite you to explore and experience everything that makes Bensonville unique. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sprigg Payne Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sprigg Payne Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Roberts International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Roberts International Airport handles freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
